thread.title: Lavrov dismisses allegations that Russia plotted Montenegro coup as ‘unsubstantiated’
thread.title_full: Lavrov dismisses allegations that Russia plotted Montenegro coup as ‘unsubstantiated’

author: RT
title: Lavrov dismisses allegations that Russia plotted Montenegro coup as ‘unsubstantiated’
text:
Lavrov dismisses allegations that Russia plotted Montenegro coup as ‘unsubstantiated’   09:42 Edited time: 20 Feb, 2017 09:46 Russian Foreign Minister Sergey Lavrov slammed recent allegations that Russian authorities were involved in last year's coup attempt in Montenegro as unsubstantiated. 
DETAILS TO FOLLOW
